Geant4 VRML2 Tools
====================


``export.py``
``exportdbg.py``
``vrml2db.py``
``vrml2file.py``

``shapecnf.py``
        common defaults and commandline parsing 
``shapedb.py``
        extracts partial VRML2 based on coordinate regions or volume names
``shape.py``
        early slow approach to sub-VRML2 extraction, superceeded by ``shapedb.py``
``check_shape.py``
        debugging ``Shape``
